author: EmmaJanDuffy
title: Very disappointing Hilton stay
text:
We / I always use Hilton hotels where we can and have never had the need to complain. Always guaranteed a friendly welcome and excellent service. Sadly, not in this instance. We checked in late after a 3 hour drive from Wales to be met by a surly, bordering on rude receptionist. After loitering for what seemed like an age, he finally found our booking.
We booked the family suite and can't complain with the standard of the room. Very spacious, comfortable and very private which was good as we were travelling with our teenager.
Next morning for breakfast we were met by yet another rude member of staff who showed us to a table without a word or without the offer of tea or coffee. Had to hunt someone down to get some.
The receptionist who checked us out on the Sunday was very apologetic and friendly. A lot like what we're used to.
It hasn't put us off Hilton as generally it's a good brand and you (should) know what you're getting but this has tainted our continued patronage. A little refreshment in customer service wouldn't go amiss.
